summary: Details the life of the Russian monk Rasputin. The film shows his rise to power and how it corrupted him. His sexual perversions and madness ultimatly leads to his gruesome assasination.
cast: Aleksey Petrenko|Anatoliy Romashin|Velta Line|Alisa Freyndlikh|Aleksandr Romantsov|Yuriy Katin-Yartsev|Leonid Bronevoy|Pavel Pankov|Mikhail Danilov|Mikhail Svetin|Nelli Pshyonnaya|Aleksey Vanin|Lyudmila Polyakova|Olga Grigoreva|Boris Romanov|Sergey Muchenikov|Aleksandr Pavlov|Baiten Omarov|Pyotr Arzhanov|Vladimir Osenev|Shavkat Abdusalamov|Arkadi Arkadyev|Natalya Bespalova|Mikaela Drozdovskaya|Vladimir Erenberg|Olegar Fedoro|Sergei Golovanov|Anatoliy Goryachev|Nora Gryakalova|Boris Ivanov|Ovsey Kagan|Aleksandr Kalyagin|Sergei Karnovich-Valua|Panteleymon Krymov|Lev Lemke|Oskar Lind|Alla Maykova|Galina Nikulina|Dmitriy Orlovskiy|Ivan Palmu|Vladimir Leonidovich Raikov|Anatoliy Ravikovich|Adolf Shestakov|Anatoliy Solonitsyn|Anel Sudakevich|Sergey Svistunov|Valentina Talyzina|Georgiy Teykh|Afanasiy Trishkin|Vyacheslav Vasilyev|Nelli Vitepash|Gennadi Voropayev|Zemfira Zhemchuzhnaya
title: Agoniya
